name: Idle Amusement Park
description:
Own the funniest amusement park in the world!
Welcome your clients with all kinds of fun activities！
Build your own amusement park and expand your business!
Upgrade your amusement facilities to get more crazy slides!
Become the best amusement park manager in the world!

Features:
- Open EXCITING ATTRACTIONS
- Unlock CRAZY TRACKS
- Welcome NEW TOURISTS
- Sell ICE-CREAMS, BURGERS and so much more
- Upgrade your park to MAKE MORE MONEY

Are you ready to spend the summer in the amusement park ????!!!!
